name: Magic Pumpkin
description:
A magical town that is being destroyed by a pumpkin ghost and about to be protected by The magician of Thailand, let's see if a magician called BigX will make the city return to peace again or not? By the beginning of the city We have to fight with many ghosts. Who tried to make us die, including cemetery, broom, magic, golden pod, ghost, mysterious fire

By the pumpkin ghosts, these are caused by the feud of the witches. We have to come and manage it to not rule the city.

Developed by  Tawan Isarawattana   Supanut    Wichachoocherd
